name: 01 - User success add new product with valid Json data

testSteps.description: Example: {title=test product, price=13.5, desc=lorem ipsum sedolor, img=https://i.pravatar.cc, cat=electronic}

children.description: Given user prepare data for add new products with title test product price 13.5 description lorem ipsum sedolor image https://i.pravatar.cc category electronic
When user hit endpoint add new products with request data that has been prepared before

children.description: Then didapatkan http response code Add New Product 200
And didapatkan json schema Add New Product sesuai dengan file AddProduct/successAddNewProduct.json
And title response body add new product sama dengan test product pada saat request
And price resposne body add new product sama dengan 13.5 pada saat request
And description response body add new product sama dengan lorem ipsum sedolor pada saat request
And image url response body add new product sama dengan https://i.pravatar.cc pada saat request
And category response body add new product sama dengan electronic pada saat request

userStory.narrative:
As a User
  I want to create new product from BE side
  So that the data can be recorded and can be used by FE team to build other environment

title: 01 - User success add new product with valid Json data

dataTable.scenarioOutline: Given user prepare data for add new products with title price <price> description <desc> image <img> category <cat> When user hit endpoint add new products with request data that has been prepared before Then didapatkan http response code Add New Product 200 And didapatkan json schema Add New Product sesuai dengan file AddProduct/successAddNewProduct.json And title response body add new product sama dengan <title> pada saat request And price resposne body add new product sama dengan <price> pada saat request And description response body add new product sama dengan <desc> pada saat request And image url response body add new product sama dengan <img> pada saat request And category response body add new product sama dengan <cat> pada saat request
